actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Crime and Federal Government Surveillance

official_title: Expressing the sense of Congress that the insurrection at the United States Capitol involved acts of domestic terrorism, and condemning the instigating role of the Proud Boys in these acts.

summary.text:
This resolution makes various statements related to the insurrection at the U.S. Capitol on January 6, 2021. Among other things, the resolution

 determines that the Proud Boys have engaged in acts of domestic terrorism, including at the U.S. Capitol; adjudges that the insurrection involved acts of domestic terrorism; and condemns the instigating role of the Proud Boys organization in the insurrection.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that the insurrection at the United States Capitol involved acts of domestic terrorism, and condemning the instigating role of the Proud Boys in these acts.
